author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

There was some old electron ID code hiding in the DataFormats. It was used in some DQM, where the code was actually inactive, and a class in the PatTools. This class was not used anywhere and is therefore also on the list. @Sam-Harper, since you seem dedicated to do some cleanup on behalf of egamma for 11X anyway (thanks a ton!), this will be my last PR of this sort so I won't interfere with your work.

On the side, I'm also removing the AnalysisDataFormats/SiStripClusterInfo package as it was consisting of literally just one line.

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles and matrix tests pass.
title: Remove AnalysisDataFormats/SiStripClusterInfo and AnalysisDataFormats/Egamma packages plus dependent code
